projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience developing RESTful APIs using Django and DRF. What are some common challenges you've faced and how did you overcome them?
How do you approach optimizing database queries in Django? Can you share a specific example where you significantly improved performance?
Explain your understanding of authentication and authorization in the context of backend APIs. What security best practices do you follow?
How do you write unit and integration tests for Django applications? What tools do you prefer and why?
Describe a situation where you collaborated with a DevOps team to deploy a backend application. What were the key considerations and challenges?
Explain your experience with Celery and message queues. How have you used them to solve problems in your previous projects?
Given an array of integers, write a function to find the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray.
